short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your open tabs easily. Sort by URL or title, close selected tabs, and reset selections quickly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Manager is the ultimate tool for managing your open tabs in Microsoft Edge. Easily view all your open tabs in a sortable table format. Sort your tabs by URL or title to quickly find what you want. Select multiple tabs with checkboxes and close them simultaneously, or reset your selections with a single click. Stay organized and improve browsing efficiency with Tab Manager's intuitive, user-friendly interface.
